top.title: Eyewitness captures moment man tackles and disarms Bondi shooter
top.summary: New South Wales Police say that 11 people were killed, plus one gunman, in a shooting at Bondi Beach targeting the Jewish community.

top.title: 'Person of interest' detained over Brown University shooting, police say
top.summary: Two people died and nine others were injured in the incident in Rhode Island on Saturday.

top.title: 'Never give up': Belarusian prisoners celebrate release after US lifts sanctions
top.summary: "It's a feeling of incredible happiness," says political prisoner Maria Kolesnikova, freed after more than five years.

top.title: US TikTok investors in limbo as deal set to be delayed again
top.summary: A deal to sell TikTok has remained elusive, despite earlier claims that a deal was done.

top.title: Amazon pulls AI recap from Fallout TV show after it made several mistakes
top.summary: The errors included getting dialogue wrong and incorrectly claiming a scene was set 100 years earlier than it was.

top.title: Online gaming escaped Australia's social media ban - but critics say it's just as addictive
top.summary: Parents and experts say gaming poses many of the same risks for kids as social media, and want them included.
